Texts.Chs: （从远处）好，全体注意！从这建筑出去！这鬼地方再过一会就要塌了——*安静*
Texts.Eng: (from a distance) Okay, everyone! Out of the building! This darn place will fall apart in a few moments--*static*
(someone else) We've lost contact with station B!

Texts.Chs: ...别担心，我们很快就会派出救援飞船到那个星球上。
Texts.Eng: ...Don't worry, we're sending a rescue ship to the planet in a few moments.

Texts.Chs: 你……你好？这里是站点B。我们正被^orange;恐怖机器人^reset;攻击。
Texts.Eng: H-hello, this is station B. We're being attacked by project ^orange;Bot of Terror^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 并不！基本上半数的科学家都^red;死^reset;了！其他的都被困住了！
Texts.Eng: No! Already like half of the scientists are ^red;dead^reset;! The rest are trapped!

Texts.Chs: 好的……啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！过道塌了！！！啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！
Texts.Eng: Okay...AAAH!!! THE HALLWAY IS CAVING IN!!! AAAAAAAAAH!!!
Station B! Station B, do you read?!

Texts.Chs: 我们正被恐怖机器人攻击，我……我们快要被困在这个设施里了！
Texts.Eng: We're being attacked by project Bot of Terror, a-and we've already initiated lockdown on the facility.
